articles.title: Inter Milan 'eyeing Christian Eriksen swap deal' with Man Utd and Arsenal - Mirror Online
articles.description: Serie A giants Inter are keen to part ways with out-of-favour midfielder Eriksen and have identified two swap-deal targets in the Premier League - at United and Arsenal
articles.content:
Inter Milan are keen to offload Christian Eriksen in a swap deal with Arsenal or Manchester United in the January transfer window, according to a report from Italy.
